name: Chordroid
description:
You are an enhance chorbeille and your task is to go inside an enemy base. But be carefull, the more you go in, the more tricky it will get

----------------

Controls:

WASD  or arow keys or joystick: Move

Crtl or A button: Shoot

Alt or B button: Boost 

----------------

This game was made in about 10 days for a school project about procedural generation
